name: Gear Pack: M.I.L.K.
description:
'Gear Pack includes:
Weapon: Cleaver Saber
Armor: Apocalyptic Hockey Mask
Armor: Apocalyptic Hockey Body
Armor: Apocalyptic Hockey Pants

This content is available for a limited time period. (Until 8/30)
This content can only be purchased once.
If your Reward Box has 50 or more items in it, you will be able to claim your purchased items when the amount of items in the box drops below 50.

The equipments obtained in this content can also be acquired through gameplay.
In order to equip weapons and armor you may need to increase your Fighter's level and reach the Equip Requirements depending on the item.
Blueprints are no longer needed for these items.
Featured equipment can now be re-purchased at Chokufunsha with Kill Coins.'

Online Play (Required)

Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense). Online features require an account and are subject to terms of service and applicable privacy policy (playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service & playstationnetwork.com/privacy-policy).
